name: I was on the last stage and my head got turned into a circle (Minijam 113 Submission)
name_original: I was on the last stage and my head got turned into a circle (Minijam 113 Submission)
description:
Play as the hero in a final fight, but the boss placed a spell on him turning their head and movements into circles!

Hold Space to change circles at the intersections.

This game is a submission for Minijam 113.

Team:

Chris - Art/Animation

Luke - Sound design

Jun - Programming
